channel.title: [pi] Need veng added
channel.description:
Need the codes for old school pi client frame veng orbs. I got the code for the tab for lunars. but when I click client freezes and nothing happens. Does anyone know the clicking buttons ids for all the lunar spells, and inferences. Please help
skype: eddie.samoylik

item.title: [pi] Need veng added
item.dc:creator: @sk8rdude461 sk8rdude461
item.description:
@sk8rdude461 wrote:

It almost looks like class9_1 is null…
Try adding a try/catch around that and see if it changes anything…

try { // Your code.. } catch(NullPointerException e) { System.out.println("error reading class9_1 on line <put line here>"); }

item.title: [pi] Need veng added
item.dc:creator: @The_Web_Guy The Web Guy
item.description:
@The_Web_Guy wrote:

[quote=“I Smoke Kush, post:7, topic:546516”][quote author=sk8rdude461 link=topic=665416.msg4448327#msg4448327 date=1410029468]

That is when I click on lunar tab and walk around, for like a second.

What’s on line 8437 of client.java? It seems to be the root of the issue, if any.
[/quote]

Idk man I’m not no genius.[/quote]

Download Notepad++ and open the file with it, on the left side of the code, you’ll see the line numbers, scroll down to 8437 and post lines 8435-8440 and we’ll be able to help you better.

If you don’t want to do all of that, just rip the code from another source.

Read full topic

item.title: [pi] Need veng added
item.dc:creator: @sk8rdude461 sk8rdude461
item.description:
@sk8rdude461 wrote:

No thanks. Lets try and solve it together (So you know how to in the future).

Run your client using the java parameter, that way we’ll have a console.
(Edit your run.bat and replace “javaw” with "java).
Now, click one of the buttons that causes the client to freeze.
The error should now pop up in your console.

Take a pic of the error, show it here.

Read full topic

item.title: [pi] Need veng added
item.dc:creator: @I_Smoke_Kush I Smoke Kush
item.description:
@I_Smoke_Kush wrote:

[quote=“sk8rdude461, post:2, topic:546516”]It might help to solve the client freezing when you click the buttons.

Also, it isn’t our job to dig around and find all the ids for you… Considering you can do it yourself.
That and every client is different. If you changed even 1 single ID from the lunar tab, that one will have a different clicking button id.
Plus, not everyone has the same interface with the same interface IDs as you.

So yeah, you may want to fix that freezing issue… Which is probably because of a null pointer…[/quote]

Yeah, never done it before bro. Try to spoon feed me with a thread relating to my problem, please.

Read full topic

item.title: [pi] Need veng added
item.dc:creator: @sk8rdude461 sk8rdude461
item.description:
@sk8rdude461 wrote:

It might help to solve the client freezing when you click the buttons.

Also, it isn’t our job to dig around and find all the ids for you… Considering you can do it yourself.
That and every client is different. If you changed even 1 single ID from the lunar tab, that one will have a different clicking button id.
Plus, not everyone has the same interface with the same interface IDs as you.

So yeah, you may want to fix that freezing issue… Which is probably because of a null pointer…

Read full topic
